## Installation

For reproducibility, `renv` was used to lock packages used.  After cloning the repo, restore from the lock file using `renv::restore()` to hopefull operate under the same environment.


## Contents

- `01-prepare-GTEx` downloads data from GTEx, generates some summary plots, and saves objects relevant for later figures
- `02-prepare-TCR` generates the objects from the GTEx data and makes TCR tree figures
- `03-figures` generates heatmaps, trees, and the GTEx/TCR comparison figures

## Adding to public repo
```
cp ./0*.Rmd ../Dewolf-TCR-landscape-2022/GTEx/
cp ./index.Rmd ../Dewolf-TCR-landscape-2022/GTEx/
cp ./pagewidth.css ../Dewolf-TCR-landscape-2022/GTEx/
cp ./_bookdown.yml ../Dewolf-TCR-landscape-2022/GTEx/
cp ./renv.lock ../Dewolf-TCR-landscape-2022/GTEx/
```
